comment:
Vanilla on the nose. Some spice. 
Smooth, not bad. Not going to inspire any great events either. Solid 2.75

It tastes like bourbon and water. It has more of a burn than it should for an 80 proof spirit, and the finish is quicker than passing through Dickens, TX going 90. I don’t even taste oak or vanilla, just light corn sweetness. Perfect for mixing.
